scripts.configure: mkdir build && cd build && mkdir win32 && cd win32 && cmake ../../src
scripts.install:win32: cd build/win32 && cmake --build . --config Release && copyfiles --flat bin/release/* ../../app/node/
scripts.package:win32: npm install && cd DDCutUI && npm install && electron-packager . --arch=ia32 --out=../dist --overwrite --icon=UI/img/logo.ico --prune=true --no-asar && cd .. && copyfiles Drivers/** dist/ddcut2-win32-ia32/
